title: Biden to Address a Masked, Covid-Tested Congress in State of the Union
sub_head: Attendees at the president’s March 1 speech will be required to comply with pandemic safety measures
body:
WASHINGTON—Every member of Congress will be invited to President Biden’s State of the Union speech, but attendees will be required to wear masks and show proof of a negative Covid-19 test, the House sergeant at arms announced on Thursday.
The March 1 prime-time address will be Mr. Biden’s next big effort to rally support for his agenda with lawmakers and voters headed into the midterm elections.
